Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38725 affecting package syslog-ng for versions less than 4.3.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-38725 affecting package syslog-ng for versions less than 4.3.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package syslog-ng is earlier than 4.3.1-2, affected by CVE-2022-38725
